caption: JPMorgan's equities trading business has a standout Q1 in 2025
trend_summary: The line graph shows JPMorgan's equities trading revenues in billions of dollars from 2014 to Q1 2025. Revenues show cyclical behavior, fluctuating between approximately $1.5bn and $2.5bn from 2014-2019 before spiking in 2020. After a subsequent dip, revenues climbed to a record high of approximately $3.8bn in the first quarter of 2025.
author: Joshua Franklin
article_title: JPMorgan chief Jamie Dimon warns of 'considerable turbulence' in US economy
